title: Family Health & Integrative Medicine | Restore Balance
description: Restore Balance combines traditional, holistic, and naturopathic approaches to promote wellness for the whole family.
cleaned_text: A new approach to health & wellness. We want to help you take control of your health. By intertwining traditional medical techniques into our integrative and functional medicine model, Restore Balance takes a unique approach to get to the root of your symptoms and restore your balance. For over four decades, Dr. Franne Berez has successfully blended traditional medicine with holistic healing to help patients reduce emotional and physical pain, restore function, and renew health. "The most beautiful experience we can have is the mysterious. It is the fundamental emotion that stands at the cradle of true art and true science."
